scripts.sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.build:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.build:android-update: node update-version.js && npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.build:android-dev: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug -PdevBuild=true
scripts.run:android-dev: npm run build && npx cap run android --target=emulator
scripts.run:android-device: npm run build && npx cap run android --target=device
scripts.build:android-release: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
